attr.title: StarBoy
attr.desc: During its journey StarBoy crashed and got lost in an unknown planet, help him return back to its spaceship!
attr.inst:
You can purchase StarBoy at: https://mrkdji.itch.io/starboy

Download and extract it, and place the starboy_linux.pck file in the gamedata directory. This has been tested with starboy_linux.zip, version 1.0.3
